AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer.synopsis: Avatar Karlach reflects on becoming a full mind flayer in END.
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer.how_to_trigger: - As avatar Karlach transform into a mindflayer in ENDOR - oe ORI_Karlach_TestMindflayerAvatarDialog

Intro.synopsis: Character Creation dialog for Avatar Karlach
Intro.how_to_trigger: Select the character as an avatar in character creation and click the button that plays their voiced character description

AvatarOverdrive.synopsis: Self-dialog in which Karlach consumes X quantity of soul coins and acquires a new power.
AvatarOverdrive.how_to_trigger: Start as avatar Karlach or recruit her as an avatar using the origin debug book and in the origins debug book use Karlach -> Overdrive -> Reach Overdrive.

FoundSoulCoin.synopsis: Karlach finds the first one of the soul coins scattered through the game. She's talking to herself (intenrally - without lipsynch)
FoundSoulCoin.how_to_trigger: With karlach as an avatar, recon create UNI_GLO_SoulCoin or origin debug book -> Karlach -> Soul Coin discovery -> Test Karlach self dialog

PAD_RemindsAboutPaladins.synopsis: Karlach remembers the player to deal with the paladins of tyr before proceeding.
PAD_RemindsAboutPaladins.how_to_trigger: Recruit Karlach as a companion and leave the recruitment and tollgouse area with her and another party member nearby.

AvatarSecondUpgrade_11.speaker: Karlach
AvatarSecondUpgrade_11.text: So. The gearhead can't fix this thing.
AvatarSecondUpgrade_11.context: NodeContext: meaning Dammon, who she quite likes, so this isn't derogatory

AvatarSecondUpgrade_17.speaker: Karlach
AvatarSecondUpgrade_17.text: Doesn't matter. What matters is I won't burn off the next hand I shake.

AvatarSecondUpgrade_21.speaker: Karlach
AvatarSecondUpgrade_21.text: It's really something, isn't it? Zariel would be fuming, seeing me so happy.

AvatarSecondUpgrade_20.speaker: Karlach
AvatarSecondUpgrade_20.text: What next, then? Back to Avernus?

AvatarSecondUpgrade_9.speaker: Karlach
AvatarSecondUpgrade_9.text: I've never considered it an option. The memories are too fresh.

AvatarSecondUpgrade_0.speaker: Karlach
AvatarSecondUpgrade_0.text: I can't go back to Avernus. I can't let her get her claws in me again. Even if it means I... I have to...

AvatarSecondUpgrade_19.speaker: Karlach
AvatarSecondUpgrade_19.text: Hells, at least I'd be in good company. Just me and every other mortal in the realm.

AvatarSecondUpgrade_13.speaker: Karlach
AvatarSecondUpgrade_13.text: But the old bucket's got a bit of life in it yet. Enough to get home.

AvatarSecondUpgrade_18.speaker: Karlach
AvatarSecondUpgrade_18.text: That'll do me. My gods, that'd be enough.

AvatarSecondUpgrade_3.speaker: Karlach
AvatarSecondUpgrade_3.text: But the old bucket's got a bit of life in it yet. Enough to see my city safe.

AvatarSecondUpgrade_2.speaker: Karlach
AvatarSecondUpgrade_2.text: If I can do that - if I can save my home - I can face whatever comes next. No matter what.

AvatarSecondUpgrade_5.speaker: Karlach
AvatarSecondUpgrade_5.text: That said, this thing might be a liability, but I'm allowed to touch people again. Let's take it out for a spin, hm?

AvatarSecondUpgrade_14.speaker: Karlach
AvatarSecondUpgrade_14.text: Sounds spectacular, if nothing else. Maybe take out a few mind flayers with the shrapnel.

AvatarSecondUpgrade_8.speaker: Karlach
AvatarSecondUpgrade_8.text: Sometimes - only sometimes - it almost sounds tempting. This thing's practically  wheezing.

AvatarSecondUpgrade_1.speaker: Karlach
AvatarSecondUpgrade_1.text: I don't want to think about that now.

AvatarSecondUpgrade_22.speaker: Karlach
AvatarSecondUpgrade_22.text: And yet it's always there. I guess there's Avernus - that's what Dammon said, right? Go back, be saved.

AvatarSecondUpgrade_4.speaker: Karlach
AvatarSecondUpgrade_4.text: No. I can't let Zariel get her claws in me again. Even if it means I... I have to...

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_2.speaker: Karlach
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_2.text: It's like I'm beyond myself. I can sense things I never knew were there...

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_18.speaker: Karlach
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_18.text: Infinite permutations. Infinite possibilities. Before, they'd have driven me mad. Now, I can see them all.

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_14.speaker: Karlach
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_14.text: I'm still the same, aren't I? I'm still me...?

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_3.speaker: Karlach
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_3.text: Yes... and no. But somehow I think this was intended. Maybe not the tentacles, but... something else.

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_26.speaker: Karlach
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_26.text: And my engine. It's... it's... silent. Still there, but no longer threatening to explode.
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_26.context: NodeContext: Can't believe what she's feeling.

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_23.speaker: Karlach
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_23.text: No pain. No gears. A calm I haven't felt in a decade - or ever.

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_28.speaker: Karlach
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_28.text: This means I'm going to live.

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_4.speaker: Karlach
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_4.text: I get to be alive. I get to stay.

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_24.speaker: Karlach
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_24.context: NodeContext: The real Karlach experience breaking through the mind flayer cool for a moment.

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_9.speaker: Karlach
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_9.text: It may be different than I thought. But I can feel. Think. Exist.

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_11.speaker: Lae'zel
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_11.text: I never thought I'd be happy to hear a ghaik will live. Yet my heart is very glad, Karlach.
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_11.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_5.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_5.text: I feel your mind, Karlach. It is immense - it is beautiful.
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_5.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayerNodeContext: in awe - karlach just became a mind flayer, and Minthara is in awe of her

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_0.speaker: Jaheira
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayerNodeContext: Genuine quiet pride in Karlach, who turned into a mindflayer to save the city (and now gets to live)

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_19.speaker: Karlach
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_19.text: My years in the Hells, my escape, every step I've taken from the shattered nautiloid to this place among infinite stars - all of it has brought me to my destiny.

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_17.speaker: Karlach
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_17.text: First: defeat the Netherbrain. Then: live.

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_12.speaker: Wyll
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_12.text: Oh, Karlach. No news could have made me happier in this house of horrors.
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_12.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_22.speaker: Shadowheart
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_22.text: It's an unorthodox way of cheating death... but if you're happy, I'm glad for you.
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_22.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayerNodeContext: Arc: SH turned from Shar. Commenting on Karlach surviving her terminal condition by becoming a mind flayer

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_20.speaker: Shadowheart
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_20.text: Lady Shar's oblivion awaits us all in the end... but I am glad you'll be able to enjoy a taste of life beforehand, Karlach.
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_20.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayerNodeContext: Arc: SH is loyal to Shar. Commenting on Karlach surviving her terminal condition by becoming a mind flayer

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_27.speaker: Gale
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_27.text: I think your new form rather suits you. It has a certain... cephalopodic charm to it. A tentacular tingle.
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_27.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_10.speaker: Astarion
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_10.text: Hells, you actually did it. I'm... happy for you? I think.
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_10.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayerNodeContext: [Vampire Lord Astarion] a little taken aback Karlach would actually become a mind flayer, but cautiously happy for her. Even if it's not a trade you'd ever make.

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_1.speaker: Astarion
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_1.text: You did it. You saw the price of freedom and decided to pay it. I - ... I'm proud of you. Well done.
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayerNodeContext: [Spawn path] A little bittersweet - Karlach's free, but she had to become a mind flayer

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_8.speaker: Minsc
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_8.text: You will live, Karlach! It will take some time to restore your muscles to their former glory, but Minsc and Boo shall train with you, every day!
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_8.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayer

AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_6.speaker: Halsin
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_6.text: Be it with horns or tentacles, I am glad you have a future to look forward to, Karlach.
AvatarTransformsIntoMindflayer_6.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach will live! Yay! But she is a mind flayerNodeContext: Encouraging

Intro_0.speaker: Origin_Intro_Karlach
Intro_0.text: Ten years ago, I was sold to the archdevil Zariel - she put a hellfire engine in my chest and made me her prize soldier.

Intro_2.speaker: Origin_Intro_Karlach
Intro_2.text: But I've escaped now - thank you, mind flayers - and I've got a few scores to settle, if this engine doesn't burn me to ash first.

Intro_3.speaker: Origin_Intro_Karlach
Intro_3.text: I'll need people I can trust. An infernal mechanic. And a serious amount of luck. But you know what? I'm not worried.

Intro_1.speaker: Origin_Intro_Karlach
Intro_1.text: After ten years in the hells, I can take on anything. I've got my chance at freedom, and believe me - I'm going home.

AvatarOverdrive_11.speaker: Karlach
AvatarOverdrive_11.text: Oh yeah. That last soul coin was just what I needed. I feel... I feel incredible!
AvatarOverdrive_11.context: CinematicNodeContext: She starts doing tricks with fire, juggling a fireball, flipping it around her and catching it again (this is for animation, not mocap)

AvatarOverdrive_9.speaker: Karlach
AvatarOverdrive_9.text: Phew, it's getting a little hot.

AvatarOverdrive_13.speaker: Karlach
AvatarOverdrive_13.text: It's all right... I'm in control. I'm in control.
AvatarOverdrive_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sshe shakes out her body and seems to regain composure again. Nevertheless, she is strained and grimacing, the fire is having a negative effect on her. She falls to 1 knee.NodeContext: Straining to convince herself as the fire overwhelms her.

AvatarOverdrive_8.speaker: Karlach
AvatarOverdrive_8.text: Reach deep, or I'll kill you myself!

AvatarOverdrive_10.speaker: Karlach
AvatarOverdrive_10.text: Of course I can. Of course... I... can...
AvatarOverdrive_10.context: CinematicNodeContext: She regains composure and rises to her feet.

AvatarOverdrive_25.speaker: Karlach
AvatarOverdrive_25.text: Well. That could've gone slightly better. But could've gone slightly worse too. Well done, Karlach. Once again.
AvatarOverdrive_25.context: NodeContext: laughter becomes a wince of pain

AvatarOverdrive_19.speaker: Karlach
AvatarOverdrive_19.text: Ah. Easy as a blue morning. As you were, all in hand, and onward and onward again.
AvatarOverdrive_19.context: NodeContext: False breeziness; she scared herself.

AvatarOverdrive_6.speaker: Karlach
AvatarOverdrive_6.context: CinematicNodeContext: flames consume Karlach and she shouts out in painInternalNodeContext: Karlach takes fire damage

AvatarOverdrive_20.speaker: Karlach
AvatarOverdrive_20.text: I've got this. I can handle this. I can control this. It's all right. It's all right.
AvatarOverdrive_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: She struggles on the ground panting, but slowly the flames die down as she controls them. She stands up in full control.

AvatarOverdrive_14.speaker: Karlach
AvatarOverdrive_14.text: Come on. You've faced worse than this. You were made for this. You are the inferno!

AvatarOverdrive_22.speaker: Karlach
AvatarOverdrive_22.text: And just like that... just like that... she proved herself right.
AvatarOverdrive_22.context: CinematicNodeContext: She regains composure and rises to her feet.

AvatarOverdrive_24.speaker: Karlach
AvatarOverdrive_24.text: I'm cold as ice. There is no fire. Everything is fine.

AvatarOverdrive_3.speaker: Karlach
AvatarOverdrive_3.text: I am frost. I am ice. I am Never-fucking-Winter.
AvatarOverdrive_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: She regains composure and rises to her feet.

AvatarOverdrive_5.speaker: Karlach
AvatarOverdrive_5.text: I feel amazing. I've never been more powerful!

AvatarOverdrive_17.speaker: Karlach
AvatarOverdrive_17.context: CinematicNodeContext: She slowly falls to 1 knee, the fire threatening to consume her. She falls to 1 knee.

AvatarOverdrive_15.speaker: Karlach
AvatarOverdrive_15.text: Ungh... yeah! I've got this... I've got this!
AvatarOverdrive_15.context: CinematicNodeContext: She shakes out her body and seems to calm it again. Nevertheless, she is strained and grimacing, the fire is having a negative effect on her. She falls to 1 knee.

FoundSoulCoin_12.speaker: Karlach
FoundSoulCoin_12.text: Holy shit. A soul coin. Wonder if they work even up here...

FoundSoulCoin_22.speaker: Karlach
FoundSoulCoin_22.text: I don't want to know. That's a soul - might make me stronger, but it's not mine to use.

FoundSoulCoin_19.speaker: Karlach
FoundSoulCoin_19.text: No - it's a soul. Once consumed, gone forever. Never to be used, even if it does turn me into a powerhouse.

FoundSoulCoin_2.speaker: Karlach
FoundSoulCoin_2.text: So it is thoughten, so let it be done.

FoundSoulCoin_20.speaker: Karlach
FoundSoulCoin_20.text: Let's split the difference. I'll only use it when I could really use a little help in battle.

FoundSoulCoin_11.speaker: Karlach
FoundSoulCoin_11.text: Being a good guy comes with perks, right? Let's give it a bash!

FoundSoulCoin_9.speaker: Karlach
FoundSoulCoin_9.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach should consume soul coin (not shown in cine)

FoundSoulCoin_16.speaker: Karlach
FoundSoulCoin_16.text: I shouldn't, really - it is a soul after all. Zariel might've been happy to use 'em willy nilly, but she was an evil freak.

FoundSoulCoin_23.speaker: Karlach
FoundSoulCoin_23.text: But... maybe I'm an evil freak too.

FoundSoulCoin_15.speaker: Karlach
FoundSoulCoin_15.text: No. I am good. And good people only use soul coins when they really, really need a pick-me-up.

FoundSoulCoin_7.speaker: Karlach
FoundSoulCoin_7.text: That's it - will keep it on hand for good use and nothing else. Nothing... else...

FoundSoulCoin_14.speaker: Karlach
FoundSoulCoin_14.text: Better put it away 'til I can use it in battle.

FoundSoulCoin_0.speaker: Karlach
FoundSoulCoin_0.text: That seems measured. I'm measured. Aren't I?

FoundSoulCoin_8.speaker: Karlach
FoundSoulCoin_8.text: Yes. Save it for when you really need a supercharge in battle. It's the only option, really.

FoundSoulCoin_3.speaker: Karlach
FoundSoulCoin_3.text: Better than measured - you're good. Keep the coin safe. Do not consume it. Ever.

PAD_RemindsAboutPaladins_0.speaker: Karlach
PAD_RemindsAboutPaladins_0.text: Hang on, those paladins I need to stomp are that-a-way.
